name: Product Roadmap Template (Quarterly)
description:
This is a simple roadmap template for planning a quarterly set of initiatives. Simply start one at the beginning of each quarter and populate by dragging each of the items into the various slots in the grid.


I've been using something similar for a while now, and turned this into a template in the hope that others might benefit from using it.


Please share any thoughts for improvements with me in the comments.
